short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Gmeet automatically use a specific mic, every time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't you hate choosing your laptop's internal mic every single time you join a Gmeet call?

I do too - so I built this. 

With this extension, you can auto-select a specific mic every time you open a Gmeet call or change media devices (eg. putting your earbuds in or connecting to an external camera).

Source code available for review here:
https://github.com/gradywetherbee/specify-gmeet-mic
